intro: Discover the environments that will welcome you.

items.name: Luci
items.description: Nafidha will immediately welcome you with style making you feel at home.

items.name: Soggiorno
items.description: The living room with a high and very lighted ceiling houses the dining area and the relaxation area with the sofa bed, the TV and the games console.

items.name: Finestre soggiorno
items.description: The large windows in the living room have a view of the garden, giving light to the environment.

items.name: Interno porta ingresso
items.description: The entrance door from the garden. The simple sofa to be transformed into a bed able to offer one or two additional beds if needed (width of the bed 120 cm).

items.name: Ingresso cucina
items.description: The dining table can comfortably accommodate four people. To be able to taste Nafidha wine will be & agrave; very comfortable without leaving your plate :)

items.name: Illuminazione soggiorno
items.description: We have tried to combine traditional and industrial taste. Elements of restored historic homes, exposed wood to create warmth, functional and essential design.

items.name: Tavolo da pranzo
items.description: To eat in Nafidha you just have to worry about creating your dishes. You will find dishes and accessories for cooking, as well as essential ingredients and food at your disposal as a welcome.

items.name: Cucina
items.description: The living room leads directly to the kitchen, which is well organized and organized in its spaces: fridge, two burners hob, large sink, microwave oven.

items.name: Accessori cucina
items.description: In addition to the essential things you would expect to find in all kitchens, you will have a coffee machine (Nespresso capsules), a kettle, and of course a nice selection of coffee, teas and infusions.

items.name: Camera da letto
items.description: In the bedroom a double bed, furniture, chest of drawers and mirror will welcome you.

items.name: Camera da letto
items.description: The bedroom furniture is all made of natural wood and cleverly exploits the space.

items.name: Comodino
items.description: Time to rest will never be as pleasant as here.

items.name: Letto
items.description: Soft light, books at your fingertips, a comfortable bed. We have looked for the best way to make you rest.

items.name: Bagno
items.description: The bathroom is equipped with every indispensable thing for a home.

items.name: Bagno
items.description: The industrial shower has the right space for two.

items.name: Ingresso
items.description: Entrance to the house in the garden and the gazebo in the common area.

items.name: Ingresso
items.description: Nafidha's garden with the barbeque at the back.

items.name: Esterno
items.description: The exterior is made to be lived and the pergola is one of the rooms of the house.

items.name: Tavolo
items.description: The outdoor table is made to be used from breakfast to dinner.

items.name: Tavolo
items.description: The pergola leads directly into the bedroom through a French door.

items.name: Tavolo
items.description: The large windows overlook the garden and the trees will be a beautiful setting

items.name: Tavolo
items.description: The hammock can be seen in the reflection ... to discover it you just have to come to us.

items.name: Host
items.description: The hosts that will welcome you
